test_cases.description: Valid new patient booking with all required fields filled.
test_cases.preconditions: User is logged in on the diary screen.
test_cases.expected_result: Booking is reflected on the selected diary and time slot with a black 'A' icon.

test_cases.description: Attempt booking with missing required fields (no contact number).
test_cases.preconditions: User is logged in on the diary screen.
test_cases.expected_result: Booking is NOT made. Error message for missing required field is shown.

test_cases.description: Attempt booking and close the screen before saving.
test_cases.preconditions: User is logged in on the diary screen.
test_cases.expected_result: Booking is NOT made. No changes in the diary.

test_cases.description: Booking with boundary value for appointment time (earliest slot)
test_cases.preconditions: User is logged in on the diary screen.
test_cases.expected_result: Booking is reflected at the earliest available time slot.

test_cases.description: Booking with boundary value for appointment time (latest slot)
test_cases.preconditions: User is logged in on the diary screen.
test_cases.expected_result: Booking is reflected at the latest available time slot.

test_cases.preconditions: User is logged in on the diary screen.
test_cases.expected_result: Booking is NOT made. Error message for invalid email is shown.
